title: How to Report a Bug
body:
When you dash towards Tristana and she blasts you literally across the map with her Buster Shot, this is the place to report it!  When there is a problem that occurs within the Client,  a patching related issues, or anything that involves gameplay (stuns not working, unintended interactions between abilities, vision issues, etc.) post it here following these guidelines.  

**How to Submit a Bug**

1. In the title, briefly describe the bug and tag it as either [GAMEPLAY], [CLIENT], or [CRASH]
2. In the body of the post, include a more in-depth description of the bug you are encountering.
3. Follow up the description of the bug with numbered step-by-step instructions on how to reproduce the issue.
4. Include how frequently you can get the issue to occur and any video or screenshots of the bug that might help clarify it.

You can find a good example of a bug submission [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/21gfV9sM-example-of-a-good-bug-submission)

**Why is this helpful to us and good for you?**

As a player, I get just as frustrated as anyone else when a bug causes me to lose a teamfight, or even miss a minion kill.  Getting this information allows us to more quickly identify why things are broken and will expedite the process so it doesn’t happen anymore.  The most useful information you can provide is how you got the bug to happen, and how frequently you can reproduce the issue (or how often it uncontrollably happens to you).  Myself and other Rioters will be constantly looking at these boards, communicating about issues you see, and most importantly taking these problems to the correct people so that they can get fixed!

**Please do not report a bug in this discussion.**

Hey there Shierunsensei!

First of all, thanks for taking a look at the Bug Report forums and bringing this issue up.

Now, on to your question. If you have any memory of the steps to reproduce this specific bug it would be very helpful for us if you could try to list as many of the reproduction steps as possible.Feel free to make a topic about it at your own leisure and then update it with as much content as you want. Even if you don't have all of the steps to reproduce the bug, having a place where others experiencing the same issue can share their info would be very helpful.

Thanks again! :)

[GAMEPLAY] Cancelled Movement Commands

I am having an issue (on all champions I play: Irelia, Fiora, Vi, Veigar) where when I click somewhere across the map to move there, my movement will randomly stop along the path. For Instance, if I am by my inhib turret and I right click to move to the enemy base, my champion will randomly stop halfway down the lane, until I give another movement command.

This is really frustrating if I am trying to watch the area or fight that my champ is heading to while I move there, and don't realize that my movement has been cancelled, etc.

Any thoughts/fixes would be greatly appreciated, thanks!
